page.title: 14Medical Care, Horsmonden
page.content: The main surgery is in Lamberhurst Road and has two doctors, Dr. Ironmonger and Dr. Anderson. This surgery is only three years old and it was previously a private house. It is open from 8.30 to 9.00 a.m. from Monday to Friday. The doctors see patients by appointment from ll.00 to l2.30 p.m. on Mondays, Wednesdays and Thursdays. Mrs. Fairhurst is the nurse attached to the surgery: Mrs. Guest and Mrs. Armitage are the receptionists. The doctor from Lamberhurst, Dr. Johnson, holds a surgery twice a week in a house in Maidstone Road. Some people prefer the Goudhurst doctor, Dr. Hugo. As there is no dentist in Horsmonden, most people go to Tunbridge Wells, Cranbrook or Paddock Wood. There is a chiropodist called Mrs. Manley who comes every six weeks to the Village Hall.
